062import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.config.FrameworkConfigHolder.getFrameworkConfig;

064import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.config.UiConfigHolder.getUiConfig;
065import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.config.UiFrameworkConfigHolder.getUiFrameworkConfig;

068import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.storage.StorageKeysUi.UI;
069import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.storage.StorageKeysUi.USERNAME;
070
071/**
072 * JUnit 5 test extension for managing UI-related test execution lifecycle.
073 *
074 * <p>This extension provides support for:
075 * <ul>
076 *     <li>Intercepting UI-related HTTP requests using {@link InterceptRequests}.</li>
077 *     <li>Automating login via UI authentication using {@link AuthenticateViaUi}.</li>
078 *     <li>Capturing screenshots on test failures and optionally on passed tests.</li>
079 *     <li>Registering UI assertions and handling WebDriver session cleanup.</li>
080 *     <li>Intercepting backend requests in Chrome DevTools.</li>
081 * </ul>
082 *
083 * <p>It integrates with {@link SmartWebDriver} for Selenium interactions and works
084 * with {@link Quest} for structured test execution.
085 * </p>
086 *
087 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
088 */
089public class UiTestExtension implements BeforeTestExecutionCallback, AfterTestExecutionCallback,
090   TestExecutionExceptionHandler, LauncherSessionListener {
091
092   private static final String SELENIUM_PACKAGE = "org.openqa.selenium";
093   private static final String UI_MODULE_PACKAGE = "cyborgcode.roa.ui";
094
095   static {
096      AssertionRegistry.registerCustomAssertion(TableAssertionTypes.TABLE_NOT_EMPTY,
097         TableAssertionFunctions::validateTableNotEmpty);
098      AssertionRegistry.registerCustomAssertion(TableAssertionTypes.TABLE_ROW_COUNT,
099         TableAssertionFunctions::validateTableRowCount);
100      AssertionRegistry.registerCustomAssertion(TableAssertionTypes.EVERY_ROW_CONTAINS_VALUES,
101         TableAssertionFunctions::validateEveryRowContainsValues);
102      AssertionRegistry.registerCustomAssertion(TableAssertionTypes.TABLE_DOES_NOT_CONTAIN_ROW,
103         TableAssertionFunctions::validateTableDoesNotContainRow);
104      AssertionRegistry.registerCustomAssertion(TableAssertionTypes.ALL_ROWS_ARE_UNIQUE,
105         TableAssertionFunctions::validateAllRowsAreUnique);
106      AssertionRegistry.registerCustomAssertion(TableAssertionTypes.NO_EMPTY_CELLS,
107         TableAssertionFunctions::validateNoEmptyCells);
108      AssertionRegistry.registerCustomAssertion(TableAssertionTypes.COLUMN_VALUES_ARE_UNIQUE,
109         TableAssertionFunctions::validateColumnValuesAreUnique);
110      AssertionRegistry.registerCustomAssertion(TableAssertionTypes.TABLE_DATA_MATCHES_EXPECTED,
111         TableAssertionFunctions::validateTableDataMatchesExpected);
112      AssertionRegistry.registerCustomAssertion(TableAssertionTypes.ROW_NOT_EMPTY,
113         TableAssertionFunctions::validateRowNotEmpty);
114      AssertionRegistry.registerCustomAssertion(TableAssertionTypes.ROW_CONTAINS_VALUES,
115         TableAssertionFunctions::validateRowContainsValues);
116      AssertionRegistry.registerCustomAssertion(TableAssertionTypes.ALL_CELLS_ENABLED,
117         TableAssertionFunctions::validateAllCellsEnabled);
118      AssertionRegistry.registerCustomAssertion(TableAssertionTypes.ALL_CELLS_CLICKABLE,
119         TableAssertionFunctions::validateAllCellsClickable);
120   }
121
122   /**
123    * Executes actions before the test runs, such as:
124    * <ul>
125    *     <li>Intercepting UI-related requests.</li>
126    *     <li>Setting up authentication via UI.</li>
127    *     <li>Registering custom assertions.</li>
128    * </ul>
129    *
130    * @param context The current test execution context.
131    */
132   @Override
133   public void beforeTestExecution(final ExtensionContext context) {
134      context.getTestMethod().ifPresent(method -> {
135         processInterceptRequestsAnnotation(context, method);
136         registerAssertionConsumer(context);
137         processAuthenticateViaUiAsAnnotation(context, method);
138         registerCustomServices(context);
139      });
140   }
141
142
143   private void registerCustomServices(ExtensionContext context) {
144
145      Consumer<SuperQuest> questConsumer = UiTestExtension::postQuestCreationRegisterCustomServices;
146      addQuestConsumer(context, questConsumer);
147   }
148
149
150   private void processInterceptRequestsAnnotation(ExtensionContext context, Method method) {
151      Optional.ofNullable(method.getAnnotation(InterceptRequests.class))
152         .ifPresent(intercept -> {
153            String[] urlsForIntercepting;
154            try {
155               List<Class<? extends Enum>> enumClassImplementations =
156                  ReflectionUtil.findEnumClassImplementationsOfInterface(
157                     DataIntercept.class, getFrameworkConfig().projectPackages());
158
159               if (enumClassImplementations.isEmpty()) {
160                  urlsForIntercepting = intercept.requestUrlSubStrings();
161               } else {
162                  List<String> resolvedEndpoints = Arrays.stream(intercept.requestUrlSubStrings())
163                     .map(target -> {
164                        for (Class<? extends Enum> enumClass : enumClassImplementations) {
165                           try {
166                              @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
167                              Enum enumValue = Enum.valueOf((Class) enumClass, target);
168                              return ((DataIntercept<?>) enumValue).getEndpointSubString();
169                           } catch (IllegalArgumentException ignore) {
170                              //ignore
171                           }
172                        }
173                        return target;
174                     })
175                     .toList();
176
177                  urlsForIntercepting = resolvedEndpoints.toArray(new String[0]);
178               }
179            } catch (Exception e) {
180               urlsForIntercepting = intercept.requestUrlSubStrings();
181            }
182
183            final String[] finalUrlsForIntercepting = urlsForIntercepting;
184            Consumer<SuperQuest> questConsumer =
185               quest -> postQuestCreationIntercept(quest, finalUrlsForIntercepting);
186            addQuestConsumer(context, questConsumer);
187         });
188   }
189
190
191   private static void postQuestCreationIntercept(final SuperQuest quest, final String[] urlsForIntercepting) {
192      SmartWebDriver artifact = quest.artifact(UiServiceFluent.class, SmartWebDriver.class);
193      WebDriver driver = unwrapDriver(artifact.getOriginal());
194      if (driver instanceof ChromeDriver chromeDriver) {
195         DevTools chromeDevTools = chromeDriver.getDevTools();
196         chromeDevTools.createSession();
197         chromeDevTools.send(Network.enable(Optional.empty(), Optional.empty(), Optional.empty(),
198            Optional.empty(), Optional.empty()));
199
200         Map<String, String> requestMethodMap = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
201
202
203         chromeDevTools.addListener(Network.requestWillBeSent(), event -> {
204            String method = event.getRequest().getMethod();
205            RequestId requestId = event.getRequestId();
206            requestMethodMap.put(requestId.toString(), method);
207         });
208
209         chromeDevTools.addListener(Network.responseReceived(), entry -> {
210            RequestId requestId = entry.getRequestId();
211            int statusCode = entry.getResponse().getStatus();
212            String method = requestMethodMap.get(requestId.toString());
213            String url = entry.getResponse().getUrl();
214            ApiResponse response = new ApiResponse(url, method, statusCode);
215
216            if (checkUrl(urlsForIntercepting, url)) {
217               try {
218                  String body = chromeDevTools.send(Network.getResponseBody(entry.getRequestId())).getBody();
219                  response.setBody(body);
220               } catch (Exception e) {
221                  response.setBody("Error retrieving response body: " + e.getMessage());
222               }
223            }
224            addResponseInStorage(quest.getStorage(), response);
225         });
226      } else {
227         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Intercepting Backend Requests is only acceptable with Chrome browser");
228      }
229   }
230
231
232   private void processAuthenticateViaUiAsAnnotation(ExtensionContext context, Method method) {
233      Optional.ofNullable(method.getAnnotation(AuthenticateViaUi.class))
234         .ifPresent(login -> {
235            try {
236               ApplicationContext appCtx = SpringExtension.getApplicationContext(context);
237               DecoratorsFactory decoratorsFactory = appCtx.getBean(DecoratorsFactory.class);
238               LoginCredentials credentials = login.credentials().getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance();
239               Consumer<SuperQuest> questConsumer =
240                  quest -> postQuestCreationLogin(quest, decoratorsFactory, credentials.username(),
241                     credentials.password(), login.type(), login.cacheCredentials());
242               addQuestConsumer(context, questConsumer);
243            } catch (InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException
244                     | NoSuchMethodException e) {
245               throw new AuthenticationUiException("Failed to instantiate login credentials", e);
246            }
247         });
248   }
249
250
251   private void registerAssertionConsumer(ExtensionContext context) {
252      Consumer<SuperQuest> questConsumer = quest -> postQuestCreationAssertion(quest, context.getDisplayName());
253      addQuestConsumer(context, questConsumer);
254   }
255
256
257   private void addQuestConsumer(ExtensionContext context, Consumer<SuperQuest> questConsumer) {
258      var consumers = getOrCreateQuestConsumers(context);
259      consumers.add(questConsumer);
260   }
261
262
263   @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
264   private List<Consumer<SuperQuest>> getOrCreateQuestConsumers(ExtensionContext context) {
265      return (List<Consumer<SuperQuest>>) context.getStore(ExtensionContext.Namespace.GLOBAL)
266         .computeIfAbsent(StoreKeys.QUEST_CONSUMERS,
267            key -> new ArrayList<>());
268   }
269
270
271   private static void addResponseInStorage(Storage storage, ApiResponse apiResponse) {
272      List<ApiResponse> responses = storage.sub(UI).get(RESPONSES, new ParameterizedTypeReference<>() {
273      });
274      if (responses == null) {
275         responses = new ArrayList<>();
276      }
277      responses.add(apiResponse);
278      storage.sub(UI).put(RESPONSES, responses);
279
280      LogUi.extended("Response added to storage: URL={}, Status={}", apiResponse.getUrl(), apiResponse.getStatus());
281   }
282
283
284   private static boolean checkUrl(String[] urlsForIntercepting, String url) {
285      return Arrays.stream(urlsForIntercepting).anyMatch(url::contains);
286   }
287
288
289   /**
290    * Executes actions after the test completes, such as:
291    * <ul>
292    *     <li>Taking screenshots if enabled.</li>
293    *     <li>Cleaning up the WebDriver session.</li>
294    * </ul>
295    *
296    * @param context The current test execution context.
297    */
298   @Override
299   public void afterTestExecution(ExtensionContext context) {
300      ApplicationContext appCtx = SpringExtension.getApplicationContext(context);
301      DecoratorsFactory decoratorsFactory = appCtx.getBean(DecoratorsFactory.class);
302      SmartWebDriver smartWebDriver = getSmartWebDriver(decoratorsFactory, context);
303      WebDriver driver = unwrapDriver(smartWebDriver);
304      if (context.getExecutionException().isEmpty() && getUiFrameworkConfig().makeScreenshotOnPassedTest()) {
305         takeScreenshot(driver, context.getDisplayName());
306      }
307      List<ApiResponse> responses = getSuperQuest(context).getStorage().sub(UI).getAllByClass(RESPONSES,
308         ApiResponse.class);
309      if (!responses.isEmpty()) {
310         String formattedResponses = ResponseFormatter.formatResponses(responses);
311         Allure.addAttachment("Intercepted Requests", "text/html",
312            new ByteArrayInputStream(formattedResponses.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8)), ".html");
313      }
314      if (!smartWebDriver.isKeepDriverForSession()) {
315         driver.quit();
316         LogUi.info("WebDriver closed successfully.");
317      }
318   }
319
320
321   /**
322    * Handles test execution exceptions by capturing a screenshot and throwing the error.
323    *
324    * @param context   The current test execution context.
325    * @param throwable The exception that occurred during test execution.
326    * @throws Throwable The rethrown exception.
327    */
328   @Override
329   public void handleTestExecutionException(ExtensionContext context, Throwable throwable) throws Throwable {
330      LogUi.error("Unhandled exception during UI test execution ({}).",
331         context.getDisplayName(), throwable);
332
333      ApplicationContext appCtx = SpringExtension.getApplicationContext(context);
334      DecoratorsFactory decoratorsFactory = appCtx.getBean(DecoratorsFactory.class);
335
336      SmartWebDriver smartWebDriver = getSmartWebDriver(decoratorsFactory, context);
337      WebDriver driver = unwrapDriver(smartWebDriver);
338      takeScreenshot(driver, context.getDisplayName());
339      if (!smartWebDriver.isKeepDriverForSession()) {
340         driver.quit();
341      }
342      throw throwable;
343   }
344
345
346   @Override
347   public void launcherSessionClosed(LauncherSession session) {
348      BaseLoginClient.getDriverToKeep().forEach(smartWebDriver -> {
349         WebDriver driver = unwrapDriver(smartWebDriver);
350         driver.quit();
351      });
352
353   }
354
355
356   private static void postQuestCreationRegisterCustomServices(SuperQuest quest) {
357      String[] projectPackages = getUiConfig().projectPackages();
358
359      List<Class<? extends UiServiceFluent>> customUiServices =
360         ReflectionUtil.findImplementationsOfInterface(
361            UiServiceFluent.class,
362            projectPackages
363         );
364
365      if (customUiServices.size() > 1) {
366         if (haveMultipleCodeSources(customUiServices)) {
367
368            customUiServices =
369               ReflectionUtil.findImplementationsOfInterface(
370                  UiServiceFluent.class,
371                  projectPackages[0]
372               );
373         }
374
375         if (customUiServices.size() > 1) {
376            throw new IllegalStateException(
377               "There is more than one UI service that extends UiServiceFluent. Only 1 is allowed. Found: "
378                  + customUiServices
379            );
380         }
381      }
382      if (!customUiServices.isEmpty()) {
383         Class<? extends UiServiceFluent> customUiServiceFluentClass = customUiServices.get(0);
384         try {
385            SmartWebDriver driver = quest.artifact(UiServiceFluent.class, SmartWebDriver.class);
386            quest.registerRing(customUiServiceFluentClass, customUiServiceFluentClass.getDeclaredConstructor(
387               SmartWebDriver.class, SuperQuest.class).newInstance(driver, quest));
388            quest.removeRing(UiServiceFluent.class);
389         } catch (InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException
390                  | NoSuchMethodException e) {
391            throw new ServiceInitializationException("Failed to register custom UI service", e);
392         }
393      }
394
395   }
396
397   private static boolean haveMultipleCodeSources(List<Class<? extends UiServiceFluent>> classes) {
398      return classes.stream()
399         .map(UiTestExtension::getCodeSourceLocationSafe)
400         .distinct()
401         .limit(2)              // we only care if there are at least 2 different ones
402         .count() > 1;
403   }
404
405   private static URL getCodeSourceLocationSafe(Class<?> clazz) {
406      CodeSource codeSource = clazz.getProtectionDomain().getCodeSource();
407      return codeSource != null ? codeSource.getLocation() : null;
408   }
409
410
411   private static void postQuestCreationLogin(SuperQuest quest, DecoratorsFactory decoratorsFactory,
412                                              final String username, final String password,
413                                              final Class<? extends BaseLoginClient> type, boolean cache) {
414      quest.getStorage().sub(UI).put(USERNAME, username);
415      quest.getStorage().sub(UI).put(PASSWORD, password);
416      UiServiceFluent<?> uiServiceFluent = quest.use(UiServiceFluent.class);
417
418      try {
419         BaseLoginClient baseLoginClient = type.getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance();
420         baseLoginClient.login(decoratorsFactory.decorate(uiServiceFluent, SuperUiServiceFluent.class), username,
421            password, cache);
422      } catch (InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException
423               | NoSuchMethodException e) {
424         throw new AuthenticationUiException("Failed to instantiate or execute login client", e);
425      }
426   }
427
428
429   private static void postQuestCreationAssertion(SuperQuest quest, String testName) {
430      SmartWebDriver smartWebDriver = quest.artifact(UiServiceFluent.class, SmartWebDriver.class);
431      quest.getSoftAssertions().registerObjectForPostErrorHandling(SmartWebDriver.class, smartWebDriver);
432
433      CustomSoftAssertion.registerCustomAssertion(
434         SmartWebDriver.class,
435         (assertionError, driver) -> takeScreenshot(unwrapDriver(driver.getOriginal()),
436            "soft_assert_failure_" + testName),
437         stackTrace -> Arrays.stream(stackTrace)
438            .anyMatch(element -> element.getClassName().contains(SELENIUM_PACKAGE)
439               || element.getClassName().contains(UI_MODULE_PACKAGE))
440      );
441   }
442
443
444   private static void takeScreenshot(WebDriver driver, String testName) {
445      if (!Objects.equals(CustomAllureListener.getActiveStepName(), TEAR_DOWN.getDisplayName())) {
446         CustomAllureListener.stopStep();
447         CustomAllureListener.startStep(TEAR_DOWN);
448      }
449      try {
450         TakesScreenshot screenshot = (TakesScreenshot) driver;
451         byte[] screenshotBytes = screenshot.getScreenshotAs(OutputType.BYTES);
452         Allure.addAttachment(testName, new ByteArrayInputStream(screenshotBytes));
453         LogQuest.info("Screenshot taken and stored for: " + testName);
454      } catch (Exception e) {
455         LogUi.error("Failed to take screenshot for test '{}': {}", testName, e.getMessage());
456      }
457   }
458
459
460   private static SmartWebDriver getSmartWebDriver(DecoratorsFactory decoratorsFactory, ExtensionContext context) {
461      Quest quest = (Quest) context.getStore(ExtensionContext.Namespace.GLOBAL).get(StoreKeys.QUEST);
462      SuperQuest superQuest = decoratorsFactory.decorate(quest, SuperQuest.class);
463      return superQuest.artifact(UiServiceFluent.class, SmartWebDriver.class);
464   }
465
466
467   private static WebDriver unwrapDriver(WebDriver maybeProxy) {
468      try {
469         Method getOriginalMethod = maybeProxy.getClass().getMethod("getOriginal");
470         return (WebDriver) getOriginalMethod.invoke(maybeProxy);
471      } catch (NoSuchMethodException | IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException e) {
472         throw new UiInteractionException("Failed to unwrap WebDriver", e);
473      }
474   }
475
476}
